item.title: Architecture
item.description:
Network Layout

The lab is segmented into management, services, and guest networks using VLANs and static routes.

Components

  • pfSense
  • Proxmox
  • Managed switch
  • Dedicated firewall VM

Goals

  • Reduce attack surface
  • Isolate workloads
  • Enable controlled remote access
